{{ partial "header.html" . }} {{ "" | safeHTML }} {{ partial "nav.html" . }} {{ partial "banner.html" . }} -- -- {{/* Career */}} I fell in love with design at Tongji University, Shanghai, where I pursued Bachelor of Engineering in Landscape Architecture. I then went on to get a Master of Architecture from Pratt Institute, from where I have started working towards architecture licensure in NYC.

{{ partial "header.html" . }} {{ "" | safeHTML }} {{ partial "nav.html" . }} {{ partial "banner.html" . }} I fell in love with design at Tongji University, Shanghai, where I pursued Bachelor of Engineering in Landscape Architecture. I then went on to get a Master of Architecture from Pratt Institute, from where I have started working towards architecture licensure in NYC. Having experience in a professional design capacity both in an architecture studio and with a developer, I am versatile in ability, good at clear communication, and highly responsible as a team player.
